text: Mr Henry is a consummate professional who expertly identified the source of my pain and administered treatment appropriately. He is passionate about providing good service and I highly recommend Leg & Foot Solutions üëçüèªüëçüèª
Pod Henry is so patience explaining the procedure and aftercare when I got my warts removed. Top tier service given.

Henry is chatty, warm and reassuring, very professional and amazing skills. He resolved my recurrent ankle tendinitis problem, first dealing with the acute problem, then preventing recurrence with very good advice on foot wear. The tendinitis has not recurred since I saw him!

Henry is a really good podiatrist who cares for the patient‚Äôs well being. He is very detailed in explaining the conditions and the course of action and also tailor it to your schedule in order to not disrupt the daily life of the patient.

Definitely would recommend anyone seeking a good podiatrist in town.

My experience at this clinic was very pleasant. Henry Lee, my attending podiatrist, is passionate about this field of study. He gave practical advice and spoke candidly like a friend, which made every visit an enjoyable one. He also shared professional insights, which helped me make sense of what I experience when I walk and do certain activities using my legs. It is indeed a go-to place with solutions for leg and foot issues, as the clinic name suggests. I'd recommend Henry and his clinic if anyone is looking to get help for leg or foot concerns.
